titles.title: Myelogram-Related Arachnoiditis Amendments of 1993
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and the Public Health Service Act with respect to myelogram-related arachnoiditis.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1270)

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Myelogram-Related Arachnoiditis Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit a myelogram involving the use of Pantopaque, Amipaque, Omipacque, or Isovue. Amends the Public Health Service Act to require a study and research with respect to individuals who have undergone amyelogram and who have subsequently developed arachnoiditis.
